I don't see how one could get so worked up about that. If it happens every few games then yeah but the video game community has always had cheapskates. It's even required to be in some MMORPGs to piggyback on other individuals or group of players to get good gear. 
For a game like League of Legends though, I really don't think it's worth the effort. The RP costs are not that high and you don't need skins to enjoy or functionally play the game.
